unnormalised: Arre yaar, these influencers and their "Guru" titles! Last I checked, Sharmaji was struggling to boil an egg, now he's giving life advice. Guess anyone can be a "Pandit" online these days, even if their knowledge of the Vedas is limited to what they saw in a Bollywood movie. Lol! #FakeGurus #OnlyInIndia
